pullRequest.title: Multitool offhand hunger consumption fix
pullRequest.bodyText:
Description
There was a bug that caused the multitool to consume hunger when a player used it on windstaff mode while having it in their offhand. This fix prevents that from happening.
Changes
I added a check for if the multitool was in the player's offhand in WindStaff.java
Related Issues
Mentioned on discord.
Checklist



 I have fully tested the proposed changes and promise that they will not break everything into chaos.
 I have also tested the proposed changes in combination with various popular addons and can confirm my changes do not break them.
 I followed the existing code standards and didn't mess up the formatting.
 I did my best to add documentation to any public classes or methods I added.
 I have added Nonnull and Nullable annotations to my methods to indicate their behaviour for null values
 I added sufficient Unit Tests to cover my code.

nodes.bodyText:
I know this has been here before but this can easily exploited by holding normal shears or even a multi tool in your off hand and then using a normal Wind staff.
It would probably be better to check if a wind staff is held in any of the two hands, you can use isItem(...) for this.
